name: lmfit.js
description: WebAssembly build of a C library for Levenberg-Marquardt minimization and least-squares fitting

scripts.dist: npm run all && npm run node && npm run web
scripts.web: rollup -c rollup.config.webworker.js && node src/scripts/toBase64 && rollup -c rollup.config.web.js
scripts.all: make clean && npm run cc && npm run cc-test && npm run js

author: jvail
